articles.author: Issam AHMED
articles.title: The scientist rewriting DNA, and the future of medicine - Phys.org
articles.description: A revolution is underway in gene editing—and at its forefront is David Liu, an American molecular biologist whose pioneering work is rewriting the building blocks of life with unprecedented precision.
articles.content: A revolution is underway in gene editingand at its forefront is David Liu, an American molecular biologist whose pioneering work is rewriting the building blocks of life with unprecedented precision.… [+4514 chars]
